product_name: bareMineralsSKINLONGEVITY Butter Drench Hydrating Moisturizer with Peptides
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganBUTTER DRENCH Hydrating Moisturizer with Peptides is an ultra-rich face cream formulated with Mineral Herb Complex, Shea Butter, and Ceramides that deeply hydrates, smooths, and strengthens the skin barrier*. Clinically proven to instantly and over time improve hydration in 100% of users*.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis buttery-rich moisturizer locks in moisture, restoring softness and suppleness to your skin*Use as the final touch for a healthy, radiant glow* in your skincare routine.Gluten-free + formulated without synthetic fragrance, PEGs and moreDermatologist-testedSuitable for all skin types and tonesSafe for sensitive skinResearch ResultsClinically proven to immediately boost hydration by 267% ​instantly*Clinically proven to reduce signs of aging and fine lines & wrinkles ​instantly and overtime*Clinically proven to help improve skin texture by 29%​ after four weeks*Clinically proven to improve skin barrier by 23% after four weeks* ​Clinically proven to plump skin by 24% after four weeks**Based on an independent clinical study​Key IngredientsMineral Herb Complex- Mineral-rich plant-based complex to help combat the signs of agingShea Butter- Provides intense moisture and nourishment​Peptide Blend- Enhances skin's resilience for a lasting radiant glow​Ceramides- Help maintain and prevent moisture lossItem 2640403How To UseApply evenly to face and neck. Use morning and night.Take a pearl-sized amount onto fingertips and gently massage your hands togetherApply onto skin by pressing your palms to the entire face & neck.For very dry skin, apply a generous scoop of moisturizer & gently massage directly onto the face & neck for deep buttery hydration.Use morning and night for plump, nourished skin!IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Squalane, Octyldodecanol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Trehalose, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Carbomer, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Potassium Hydroxide, Cetyl Palmitate, Fragrance (Parfum), Allantoin, Sorbitan Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply evenly to face and neck. Use morning and night.Take a pearl-sized amount onto fingertips and gently massage your hands togetherApply onto skin by pressing your palms to the entire face & neck.For very dry skin, apply a generous scoop of moisturizer & gently massage directly onto the face & neck for deep buttery hydration.Use morning and night for plump, nourished skin!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using the SKINLONGEVITY® Butter Drench Hydrating Cream with Peptides for about a week now AM and PM as a moisturizer. bareMinerals gave me this product for free in exchange for an honest review, so let's get honest. The texture is very thick. Fairly, it's a nice enough product. If you flip the jar upside down and give it the old DQ Blizzard thickness check, it's not moving! That being said, it is not hard to smooth it out over your skin, so it can be used even during summertime. Read the usage instructions carefully, you don't need very much if you don't have dry skin. You only need "a pearl-sized amount onto fingertips and gently massage your hands together. Apply onto skin by pressing your palms to the entire face & neck."

One thing I noticed right away is the a strong herbal scent. It looks like they reformulated the old butter drench (a dry to very dry skin moisturizer) to be used by all skin types by adding a mineral herb complex. It's 100% noticeable as soon as you open the jar and apply it. I absolutely love it—it smells super spa-like (think bergamot, citrus, and mint)—but I can see how it might be a bit strong for someone sensitive to fragrance. The scent does fade a bit after a while though!

In terms of performance, it compares fine to other moisturizers I've tried. I am a big fan of Tatcha (The Water Cream) during summer and this falls just a bit short of meeting the same hydration I get from my other moisturizer. I like to look dewy in the summer and this just gives me enough hydration before putting on sunscreen and make-up but no dewy look. 

It is a bit expensive, but considering how little you need per use, I think it's worth it if you want to try something new. I'd recommend it to friends with dry skin who don't mind a bold herbal scent.
faceoff_positive.headline: SKINLONGEVITY® Butter Drench Hydrating Cream with Peptides

faceoff_negative.comments:
I really wanted to love this moisturizer. The texture is beautiful — rich, creamy, and it melts into the skin so nicely. I loved the way it made my face feel soft and smooth, and it gave me a nice, light glow right after applying.

But unfortunately, it didn't fully agree with my skin. After about a week of use, I started breaking out around my nose and chin — small bumps and clogged pores that I usually don't get. I'm guessing it might be a little too heavy for me, or maybe one of the ingredients just didn't sit well with my skin type.

I think this would probably work better for someone with very dry or mature skin, but for me, it was a little too rich. It does have some really nice qualities — the hydration, the softness — but I wouldn't repurchase because of the breakouts.
faceoff_negative.headline: Smooth Finish, but My Skin Didn't Love It
